Introduction

Kim Sung Joong, formerly known by the stage name Gon, is a South Korean singer and rapper under FUTORE. He first gained recognition as a member of the boy group ARGON, which debuted in March 2019 with their single album Master Key. Although the group disbanded in late 2020, Kim Sung Joong continued to pursue his passion for music and performance.

He gained further attention as a contestant on the survival shows Peak Time and Project 7, showcasing his talent and resilience. Despite not passing the survival round on Project 7, revealed on October 18, 2024, his dedication and skill left a lasting impression on fans and industry professionals alike.

In addition to his musical journey, Kim Sung Joong fulfilled his mandatory military service from January 19, 2021, to July 18, 2022. Now focusing on his solo career, he continues to work towards new opportunities under FUTORE, earning recognition for his unwavering determination and artistry.
